# Check textdata

## namelist

Are all codes unique per language?

```{r}
read_vc(namelist_path) %>% 
    count(code, lang) %>% 
    filter(n > 1) %>% 
    nrow == 0
```

## types

Are all codes unique?

```{r}
read_vc(types_path) %>% 
    count(type) %>% 
    filter(n > 1) %>% 
    nrow == 0
```

Are all main types correct?

```{r}
read_vc(types_path) %>% 
    mutate(main_type_2 = ifelse(str_detect(type, "_"),
                                str_sub(type, 
                                        end = str_locate(type, "_") - 1),
                                type)
    ) %>% 
    filter(main_type != main_type_2) %>% 
    nrow == 0
```
